title: Xiaohongshu Data Retrieval

alerts.selectNumberField: Based on Xiaohongshu article links, retrieve title, like count, etc.
alerts.selectGroupFieldTip: The plugin can automatically create selected fields. If mapping is needed, please ensure the field names in the multidimensional table are consistent with the option names. It is recommended that the 'Blogger' field type be text, 'xx Count' field types be numbers, and 'xx Time' fields be dates. 'Total Interaction Count' field can perform calculations across multiple fields

checks.number: Type verification failed: Type is not a number

checks.datetime: Type verification failed: Type is not a date
checks.attachment: Type verification failed: Type is not an attachment

placeholder.link: Please select the field column corresponding to the video link
placeholder.interCount: Please select all the fields that need to be calculated
placeholder.cookie: Please enter the cookie as described in the documentation
